00036 
00040 class Hdf5DataReader
00041 {
00042 private:
00043 
00044     const static unsigned MAX_DATASET_RANK = 3;             
00046     std::string mDirectory;                                 
00047     std::string mBaseName;                                  
00049     hid_t mFileId;

00056     hid_t mTimeDatasetId;

00059     std::vector<std::string> mVariableNames;                
00060     std::map<std::string, unsigned> mVariableToColumnIndex; 
00061     std::map<std::string, std::string> mVariableToUnit;

00064     std::vector<unsigned> mIncompleteNodeIndices;           
00066 public:
00067 
00076     Hdf5DataReader(const std::string& rDirectory,
00077                    const std::string& rBaseName,
00078                    bool makeAbsolute=true);
00079

00087                                             unsigned nodeIndex);
00088 
00096     void GetVariableOverNodes(Vec data, const std::string& rVariableName, unsigned timestep=0);
00097 
00101     std::vector<double> GetUnlimitedDimensionValues();

00107

00112

00119

00124
